title: Love And Rockets - Studio Discography (1985-2013) FLAC
description:
When I saw the sorry state of the Love and Rockets torrents on here I knew I had to do something.  (No offense to the original uppers, but their torrents are a bit old, and it was a different time and standard back then.)  I spent a fair amount of time scouring the net and was able to put together an almost complete L&R studio discography in lossless FLAC.  (E.g. I couldn't find 'The Glittering Darkness'.)  The only one I ripped myself was 'Hot Trip to Heaven'.  I've listened to all of these songs, and if they were upsampled from something less than lossless, my ears can't detect it.  I am only bringing the music.  If you want cover art and pictures, etc. than you'll have to add them yourself.  (It's pretty easy.)

Includes:
